DOC.brief_summary: Prospectively randomize study patient renal pelvic stone candidate standard PCNL procedure . One one , control clinical trial . Patients randomly allocate two group , 20 patient group . Group A schedule receive routine standard PCNL . Group B schedule receive Robot assist pyelolethotomy .
DOC.brief_title: ROBOTIC PYELOLITHIOTOMY VERSUS PERCUTANEOUS NEPHROLITHOTOMY ( PCNL ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year . 2 . Renal stone â‰¥2 cm . 3 . Patients candidate PCNL . 4 . Patient ECOG performance score 2 less . 5 . Able give inform consent 6 . Able discharge home day . 1 . Renal stone < 2cm manage another technique . 2 . Known psychological disease .
